name: DeleteZoomMeeting
description:
Delete a specific Zoom meeting or occurrence.

Use this tool to delete a Zoom meeting. For recurring meetings, specify an `occurrence_id` to delete a single instance; otherwise, the entire series is removed. Appropriate scopes are required.

parameters.name: meeting_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Zoom meeting. Ensure to handle as a long integer due to potential size exceeding 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

parameters.name: meeting_occurrence_id
parameters.description: The ID for a specific meeting or webinar occurrence. Necessary for deleting a single occurrence in a recurring series.

value_schema.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

parameters.name: notify_host_via_email
parameters.description: Set to `true` to notify the host and alternative host about the meeting cancellation via email. Set to `false` to avoid sending notifications.

value_schema.description:
`true`: Notify host and alternative host about the meeting cancellation via email.
`false`: Do not send any email notification.

parameters.name: notify_registrants_of_cancellation
parameters.description: Set to true to notify registrants via email about the meeting cancellation; false to send no notification. Defaults to false.

value_schema.description:
`true`: Notify registrants about the meeting cancellation via email. 

`false`: Do not send any email notification to meeting registrants. 

The default value of this field is `false`.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Zoom Meetings API.

parameters.name: occurrence_id
parameters.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

value_schema.description: The meeting or webinar occurrence ID.

parameters.name: schedule_for_reminder
parameters.description:
`true`: Notify host and alternative host about the meeting cancellation via email.
`false`: Do not send any email notification.

value_schema.description:
`true`: Notify host and alternative host about the meeting cancellation via email.
`false`: Do not send any email notification.

parameters.name: cancel_meeting_reminder
parameters.description:
`true`: Notify registrants about the meeting cancellation via email. 

`false`: Do not send any email notification to meeting registrants. 

The default value of this field is `false`.

value_schema.description:
`true`: Notify registrants about the meeting cancellation via email. 

`false`: Do not send any email notification to meeting registrants. 

The default value of this field is `false`.

parameters.name: meetingId
parameters.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

value_schema.description:
The meeting's ID. 

 When storing this value in your database, you must store it as a long format integer and **not** an integer. Meeting IDs can exceed 10 digits.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
